0.ul: Do you want to sell a property ?
0.text: From the first contact with the seller and the buyer, until the signing of the authentic instrument, we use all our skills to achieve the sale or purchase of your property. In this context, you will benefit from our in-depth knowledge of the market, our sense of negotiation and our great availability. We also support you in your real estate investment projects (rental property, furnished property, etc.).

1.ul: Do you want to rent a property?
1.text: We assure you a rigorous search for a tenant, or for the property that meets your needs. Thanks to our proprietary database, we speed up your research. If you are lessors, qualified tenant files selected from our database and prospecting will be sent to you to ensure you have control over your rental income.
